Description: --> Yamaha PAC611VFMX Pacifica Electric Guitar (Translucent Black) Used This item is slightly used and has been thoroughly checked out by our experts to make sure it is in perfect working condition. We then re-sealed it in its original packaging with all factory included accessories. This item is guaranteed to be in "as new" condition and has virtually no cosmetic imperfections. This item is covered with a one year warranty from Sam Ash. The Yamaha Pacifica PAC611VFMX is a guitar for players who are serious about tone and versatility. The body is carved from alder and comfort-contoured so that it fits your posture standing or seated. Translucent satin finishes boast a flamed maple top for that classic tonewood combination. The Yamaha PAC611VFMX also features a maple bolt-on neck with 22 frets on a flat 13.75” radius rosewood fretboard which allows for luxurious string bending. Select a wide range of tones from a 3 position switch and choose between a classic Seymour Duncan SP90 in the neck position, or go for a little extra by selecting the Duncan TB-14 bridge position humbucker. The 611VFMX has expansive tonal variety from a Push/pull Coil Split built into the master tone control. A set of Grover Locking Tuners and a Wilkinson VS50 Bridge round out this affordable package that will deliver an endless variety of tones!
